name: juanma-mermaid-diagram-block
description: Create beautiful diagrams and flowcharts using Mermaid syntax directly in your WordPress posts and pages.
author: JuanMa Garrido

scripts.plugin:check: wp-env run tests-cli wp plugin check juanma-mermaid-diagram-block --exclude-directories=node_modules,src,.git --exclude-files=.gitignore,.distignore,package.json,package-lock.json,artefact.xml
scripts.lint: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/mermaid-diagram composer run lint
scripts.lint-fix: wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/mermaid-diagram composer run lint-fix
scripts.preplugin:build: npm run build && composer install --no-dev --prefer-dist --no-interaction --optimize-autoloader && docker ps --format '{{.Names}}' | grep tests-cli | xargs -I {} docker exec -u root {} apk add --no-cache zip 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.plugin:zip: npm run build && npm run plugin:build:local
